contact_us_text: For all questions, suggestions for improvement, constructive criticism, you can always write to us at
email_body:
Hello!

I'm writing about the Drift Notes app:
location_services_disabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable them.
location_permission_denied_forever: Location permission denied forever. Change settings in the app.
google_maps_api_key_required: Google Maps API key is required for the map to work:
api_key_setup_instructions:
1. Get a key in Google Cloud Console
2. Add it to lib/config/api_keys.dart file
3. Restart the application
google_maps_not_configured: Google Maps API key not configured
api_key_needed_for_map: API key is needed in app settings for the map to work
check_internet_and_location_permissions: Check internet connection and location permissions

i_have_read_and_agree: I have read and agree to the
excellent_fishing_conditions: Excellent fishing conditions! Fish should be very active.
average_fishing_conditions: Average conditions. Fish may bite, but not very actively.
poor_fishing_conditions: Poor fishing conditions. Better wait for more favorable weather.
bad_fishing_conditions: Unfavorable fishing conditions. Recommended to postpone the trip.
excellent_conditions_recommendation: Excellent conditions! Perfect time for fishing.
poor_conditions_recommendation: Conditions aren't great, but there's still a chance.
low_pressure_tip: Fish at depth during low pressure
good_wind_tip: Good wind - fish from the windward side
calm_weather_tip: Use light lures in calm weather
cold_weather_tip: Fish are less active in cold weather - slow down your retrieve
pressure_stable_good: Stable pressure is favorable for fishing
temperature_cold: Cold weather - fish are less active

pressure_falling_description: Pressure is falling - fish activity decreases

pressure_high_description: High pressure. Fish are less active.
pressure_rec_low_3: Be patient - bites may be rare
pressure_rec_high_3: Fish during morning and evening hours
open_water_recommendation: With light wind you can fish in open areas of the water body
sheltered_areas_recommendation: Look for wind-protected places: bays, shores with vegetation
avoid_exposed_recommendation: In strong wind avoid open and elevated areas
windward_fishing_recommendation: Fish from the windward side - food drifts there
wind_excellent_description: Light wind creates ideal fishing conditions.
wind_moderate_description: Fresh wind complicates fishing, but fish are still active.
